title: Citi Named to 2019 LinkedIn Top Companies List
summary: Today, Citi was named one of LinkedIn's Top 50 Companies in the U.S., and also included in the first-ever ranking of the Top 25 Companies in Mexico. LinkedIn's Top Companies List honors the most sought-after companies where professionals want to work and stay, and celebrates the companies and people making an impact in the professional world. This is a reflection of the value we place on our people and creating an environment where our employees can bring their whole selves to work and where diverse ideas and perspectives are embraced. It also underscores the scope and diversity of opportunities we offer our employees to continuously encourage career growth and development.

This is a reflection of the value we place on our people and creating an environment where our employees can bring their whole selves to work and where diverse ideas and perspectives are embraced. tag-3: The LinkedIn Top Companies List is derived from a number of factors including interest in the company, engagement with employees, job interest and retention, and is informed by the billions of actions taken by more than 610 million professionals on LinkedIn.
tag-4: We are proud to be included among the top companies in both the U.S. and Mexico this year, and recognized for our ongoing gender pay equity work globally. This acknowledgement is a testament to our commitment to an increased level of transparency about our diversity efforts, our commitment to strengthen our culture of diversity and inclusion across the firm, and a reflection of our colleagues who uphold these values in all that they do.
